remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在运行时动态数据使用若要获取特定的列类型筛选器模板的实例。The class is used at run time by Dynamic Data to get an instance of a filter template for a specific column type. 您可以重写此类自定义如何加载筛选器模板中定义的方法。You can override the methods that are defined in this class to customize how filter templates are loaded. 例如，自定义实现可以从不同于默认 ~/DynamicData/Filters 文件夹的位置加载筛选器模板。For example, a custom implementation could load the filter templates from a location different than the default ~/DynamicData/Filters folder. 动态数据提供了筛选器模板外, 键、 布尔值，并枚举列类型，并显示在它们使用控件。Dynamic Data provides filter templates for foreign-key, Boolean, and enumeration column types and displays them by using a control. 此外可以创建自定义筛选器模板。You can also create custom filter templates. ## Examples 表行筛选的示例使用默认筛选器模板，请参阅类。For an example of table row filtering uses the default filter templates, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，筛选器模板位于 ~/DynamicData/Filers 文件夹中。By default, filter templates are located in the ~/DynamicData/Filers folder. 此方法确定包含字段模板的文件夹的虚拟路径。This method determines the virtual path of the folder that contains the field template. 派生的类可以重写此方法以提供从不同的虚拟路径的筛选器模板。Derived classes can override this method to provide filter templates from a different virtual path.
